column1: | The next planned service on the Down Main cannot pass Holywell Junction until 2 minutes after the train to Mostyn |
| Docks has arrived at Mostyn Ground Signal 15.                                                                     |
| The next planned service on the Up Main cannot pass Rhyl (Talacre when open) until 2 minutes after the train to   |
| Mostyn Docks has arrived inside at Mostyn Docks.                                                                  |
